description: Search official Somnia documentation and query on-chain data for accounts, transactions, and blocks. Manage a wallet to view balances, transfer native or token assets, and control allowances. Sign messages, typed data, and transactions with fee guidance for reliable execution.

tools.name: get_address
tools.title: get_address
tools.description: Get the address of the wallet

tools.name: get_chain
tools.title: get_chain
tools.description: Get the chain of the wallet

tools.name: sign_message
tools.title: sign_message
tools.description: Sign a message with the wallet

tools.name: get_balance
tools.title: get_balance
tools.description: Get the balance of the wallet for native currency or a specific ERC20 token.

tools.name: get_token_info_by_ticker
tools.title: get_token_info_by_ticker
tools.description: Get information about a configured token (like contract address and decimals) by its ticker symbol.

tools.name: convert_to_base_units
tools.title: convert_to_base_units
tools.description: Convert a token amount from human-readable units to its smallest unit (e.g., wei).

tools.name: convert_from_base_units
tools.title: convert_from_base_units
tools.description: Convert a token amount from its smallest unit (e.g., wei) to human-readable units.

tools.name: sign_typed_data_evm
tools.title: sign_typed_data_evm
tools.description: Sign an EIP-712 typed data structure (EVM)

tools.name: get_token_allowance_evm
tools.title: get_token_allowance_evm
tools.description: Get the allowance of an ERC20 token for a spender (returns amount in base units)

tools.name: send_token
tools.title: send_token
tools.description: Send native currency or an ERC20 token to a recipient, in base units.

tools.name: approve_token_evm
tools.title: approve_token_evm
tools.description: Approve an amount (specified in base units) of an ERC20 token for a spender

tools.name: revoke_token_approval_evm
tools.title: revoke_token_approval_evm
tools.description: Revoke approval for an ERC20 token from a spender (sets allowance to 0)

tools.name: search_documentation
tools.title: search_documentation
tools.description: Search across the documentation to find relevant information, code examples, API references, and guides. Use this tool when you need to answer questions about Somnia Docs, find specific documentation, understand how features work, or locate implementation details. The search returns contextual content with titles and direct links to the documentation pages.

tools.name: get_account
tools.title: get_account
tools.description: Get information about a Somnia account/contract by address. Optionally specify a revision (best | justified | finalized | block number | block ID).

address.description: Account/contract address (20-byte hex, with or without 0x prefix)

anyOf.description: Block ID (hex) or block number as string

revision.description: Revision: best | justified | finalized | block number | block ID (hex). If omitted, best is used.

tools.name: get_transaction
tools.title: get_transaction
tools.description: Get a Somnia transaction by its ID. Optionally include pending txs (meta may be null), return raw hex, or pin to a specific head block.

raw.description: Include raw hex transaction in response. Default: false

head.description: Head block ID to use; defaults to best if omitted

pending.description: Include pending transactions (meta may be null). Default: false

tools.name: get_block
tools.title: get_block
tools.description: Retrieve information about a Somnia block by its revision (block ID, number, or keywords: best | justified | finalized).

raw.description: Return RLP-encoded block instead of structured JSON (default: false)

expanded.description: Return transactions expanded (objects) instead of just IDs (default: false)

anyOf.description: Block ID (hex) or block number as string

revision.description: Block revision: hex ID, block number, or keywords: best | justified | finalized

tools.name: get_priority_fee
tools.title: get_priority_fee
tools.description: Fetch a suggested priority fee for including a transaction in the next blocks from Somnia mainnet.

tools.name: create_wallet
tools.title: create_wallet
tools.description: Generate a BIP-39 mnemonic (12/15/18/21/24 words) and derive the Ethereum-compatible account at standard derivation path m/44'/60'/0'/0/0. Returns mnemonic, private key, and public address.

wordlistSize.description: Length of the BIP-39 mnemonic wordlist. Default: 12

tools.name: sign_certificate
tools.title: sign_certificate
tools.description: Create and sign a canonical certificate. Includes purpose, payload, domain, timestamp, nonce, and expiresAt.

domain.description: Scope or domain where it is valid

payload.description: Content to be attested (string or JSON)

tools.name: sign_raw_transaction
tools.title: sign_raw_transaction
tools.description: Sign an Ethereum raw transaction string.
